'''Gordy''' is a minor character in the [[Season 5|fifth season]]. He will be played by [[Tristan McConnell]].<ref>[http://www.imdb.com/name/nm3295900/]</ref><ref>[http://instagram.com/p/vWoX5zSwXc/?modal=true]</ref> Gordy is a [[House Bolton|Bolton]] soldier.
